item.title: Is something wrong with this.....>?!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I added safezones but they arent safeâ€¦

Code:

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if((absX >= 2806 && absX <= 2812 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3442)) { if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) inwildy2 = false; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

the 2806 2812 3438 and 3442 were fine, but when I added 2684 2823 3400 and 3492 coords they werent safezones. the 2806 coord one was alreayd added when i got the base. I am using RuneJava.

I made the coords like thye said: 2684: Southwest Xco, 2823: NorthEast Xco, 3400: southwest Yco, 3492 Northeast Yco. What is wrong?? Why wont it make safe?

Read full topic
